title: Blue Acid Dye
summaries: Blue Acid Dye is a dye that can be obtained in a set of 3 by giving a Strange Plant to the Dye Trader. When equipped in the dye slot, it will make the player's armor dark blue and create a waving effect, similar to the other Acid Dye variants. Armor dyed by it can be seen in the dark, but does not provide light.
Equipping <linked>Acid Dye</linked>, <linked>Red Acid Dye</linked> or Blue Acid Dye on the <linked>Shadow Orb</linked> can make parts of it or the whole orb invisible.

statistics.Sell: 75 SC
